title: CT transcode output specification for video thumbnails

___output_file.description: basename for the thumbnails to generate. We will appen sequence number if the 'interval' mode is selected

___snapshot_sec.description: Time in second in the video where to take the snapshot

___s3_rrs.description: Activate reduced redundancy or not in S3 storage

___output_bucket.description: S3 bucket and path where the thumbnails will be uploaded

___output_type.description: Type of the file to output
